mapper.select: SELECT CONFIG_COINID as 'coinId', CONFIG_EX_PRICE as 'priceEx', CONFIG_EX_NUMBER as 'numberEx', CONFIG_EX_TARGET as 'targetEx', CONFIG_VERSION as 'version', CONFIG_ISIN_BTCMARKET as 'inBTCMarket', CONFIG_ENABLED_COINONE as 'enabledCoinone', CONFIG_ENABLED_BITHUMB as 'enabledBithumb', CONFIG_ENABLED_UPBIT as 'enabledUpbit', CONFIG_ENABLED_COINNEST as 'enabledCoinnest', CONFIG_ENABLED_KORBIT as 'enabledKorbit', CONFIG_ENABLED_BITFINEX as 'enabledBitfinex', CONFIG_ENABLED_BITTREX as 'enabledBittrex', CONFIG_ENABLED_POLONIEX as 'enabledPoloniex', CONFIG_ENABLED_BINANCE as 'enabledBinance' FROM TB_COINBOT_CONFIG WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONFIG_COINID = #{coinId}
